Articles.Content: <figure class="tmblr-full" data-orig-height="92" data-orig-width="480"><img data-orig-height="92" data-orig-width="480" alt="image" src="http://40.media.tumblr.com/041caa78de6e28c0c93aa7e30fac66cd/tumblr_inline_nvvg333zmy1rr2wit_540.jpg"/></figure><p><object bgcolor="#000000" data="http://www.twitch.tv/swflibs/TwitchPlayer.swf" height="378" id="clip_embed_player_flash" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="620"><param name="movie" value="http://www.twitch.tv/swflibs/TwitchPlayer.swf"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"><param name="allowNetworking" value="all"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="flashvars" value="channel=1stghostlive&auto_play=false&start_volume=25&videoId=v19539335&device_id=21be23a02a2b2107"></object></p><p>1stGhostLive is the channel for those who love to play KSP! Ray uses a plethora of mods and hosts a very laid-back show to the tunes of Rachmaninov, Bach and Mozart! If you want to have a good time, take a look! .<br/><br/></p>
